<h3 id="X38144">X(38144) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(4), X(6), X(8)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6-2*(b+c)*a^5+4*(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a^4-4*b*c*(b+c)*a^3-(3*b^4+3*c^4-2*b*c*(2*b^2+3*b*c+2*c^2))*a^2+2*(b^4-c^4)*(b-c)*a-2*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38144) = 4*X(5)-X(3242) = X(6)+2*X(355) = X(8)+2*X(5480) = 4*X(10)-X(1350) = 2*X(141)-5*X(5818) = 2*X(182)+X(18525) = 2*X(597)+X(34627) = X(944)-4*X(3589) = X(1352)-4*X(18357) = 2*X(1386)+X(5881) = X(1482)-4*X(19130) = 2*X(3416)+X(11477) = 2*X(3751)+X(15069) = X(3751)+5*X(37714) = 3*X(5085)-4*X(38118) = 3*X(14561)-2*X(38040) = 2*X(38035)-3*X(38072) = 3*X(38047)-2*X(38118) = 3*X(38072)-4*X(38146) = 3*X(38087)-2*X(38116) = 3*X(38087)-4*X(38165)</b>
<p>X(38144) lies on these lines: {5,3242}, {6,355}, {8,5480}, {10,1350}, {30,38087}, {80,611}, {141,5818}, {182,18525}, {511,5790}, {515,5085}, {516,38190}, {518,5587}, {519,38035}, {524,38074}, {597,34627}, {613,37710}, {944,3589}, {952,14561}, {971,38185}, {1352,18357}, {1386,5881}, {1482,19130}, {2771,25330}, {2829,38192}, {3416,11477}, {3545,9041}, {3564,38138}, {3751,15069}, {3763,9956}, {4265,11499}, {4437,36662}, {5096,22758}, {5102,5847}, {5603,9053}, {5657,29181}, {5690,31670}, {5842,38193}, {5844,38136}, {5845,38149}, {5846,14853}, {5848,38156}, {5849,38157}, {5853,38145}, {5854,38147}, {5855,38148}, {10039,10387}, {12368,16010}, {16475,37712}, {18480,36990}, {18583,37705}, {19161,23841}, {19924,38066}, {26446,31884}, {28204,38029}, {28224,38110}, {28236,38049}</p>
<p>
X(38144) = midpoint of X(16475) and X(37712)<br>
X(38144) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5085, 38047), (10516, 5587), (31884, 26446), (38029, 38167), (38035, 38146), (38116, 38165)<br>
X(38144) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (38035, 38146, 38072), (38116, 38165, 38087)<br>
</p>
